martingale module¶

class martingale.Martingale(table, wheel, initial_bet_amount)¶

Bases: player.IPlayer

lose(bet)¶

update bet_amount to 2 times the current value reduce rounds left to 1 less than that of current value

Parameters:bet – (Bet)
placeBets()¶

place a bet on outcome ‘Black’ on the table update the stake based on bet amount

Parameters:
  • table – (Table)
  • wheel – (Wheel)
playing()¶

Returns True if player is still active

setRounds(rounds_to_go)¶

Set rounds_to_go value before simulation of a session of game play

setStake(stake)¶

Set stake value before simulation of a session of game play

update_amount()¶
win(bet)¶

update stake with the winning amount update bet_amount to initlal value reduce rounds left to 1 less than that of current value

Parameters:bet – (Bet)
winners(winning_outcomes)¶

use winning outcomes to count certain special outcomes
